input.description:
adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter use to handle the request.
Default value: VMwareInfrastructure

items The items XML used to perform action on one or more items within Virtual Infrastructure Client.
Value takes the form:
<items> <item> <parameters> .......... </parameters> </item> </items>

item type The item type that makes the judgement on what wrapper must be executed.
Valid values:
Migrate_VM Move_Virtual_Disk Revert_VM_Snapshot Validate_VM_Migration Power_Off_VM Power_On_VM Reset_VM Restart_Guest_OS Resume_VM Shut_Down_Guest_OS Suspend_VM Remove_Host_From_Cluster Move_Host_To_Cluster Acquire_Mks_Ticket Rescan_Hba Rescan_All_Hba Enter_Maintenance_Mode Exit_Maintenance_Mode Relocate_VM Import_OVF_Template_As_VApp Export_VApp_As_OVF_Template Import_OVF_Template_As_VM Export_VM_As_OVF_Template Power_On_VApp Power_Off_VApp Unregister_VApp Move_Into_Resource_Pool Move_Into_Folder Convert_VM_To_Template Convert_Template_To_VM Unregister_VM Register_VM
version The VMware Infrastructure Application version. The current supported version is v3.0 and v4.0

connection parameters [optional] The XML containing the metadata needed by the adapter to connect to the target.
Value takes the form:
<connection-parameters> <soap-url></soap-url> <transport></transport> <user-name></user-name> <password></password> </connection-parameters>

documentation.description: Perform Operations Perform action on one or more items within Virtual Infrastructure Client.
